transcript: Well, sometimes you have to do things you don't necessarily like to do to have a job, but the job before you, you know, money, you wouldn't have to be taking the bus right now.

segments.text: Well, sometimes you have to do things you don't necessarily like to do to have a job, but
the job before you, you know, money, you wouldn't have to be taking the bus right now.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, sometimes you have to do things that you don't necessarily like to do to have a job. But the job affords you money, you won't have to be taking the bus right now.
